Region_Africa.short_description: <![CDATA[ This park is one of the last major remnants of the primary tropical forest of West Africa. Its rich natural flora, and threatened mammal species such as the pygmy hippopotamus and 11 species of monkeys, are of great scientific interest.]]>

Homo gracilis, has been of fundamental importance in the study of human evolution.]]>
